title: Painting a province
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Peter Jones and Kirk Jones
brief_description: New Brunswick’s rugged coasts, peaceful farms and burgeoning towns have inspired artists for generations. This film shows paintings of both past and present-day artists. Seen in the film are Alex Colville, Jack Humphrey, Miller Brittain, Fred Ross, sculptor Claude Roussel, and artist-teacher Lawren Harris.
